tool_description: The unofficial API for skyscanner.com allows you to query hotels and flights in real-time data.
name: Skyscanner
title: Skyscanner

api_list.name: search-cars

required_parameters.name: pickUpDate
required_parameters.description:
Pick Up Date
Required: true
Format: `YYYY-MM-DD`
Ex: `2024-06-01`

required_parameters.name: pickUpTime
required_parameters.description:
Pick Up Time
Required: true
Format: `HH:MM`
Ex: `10:00`

required_parameters.name: pickUpEntityId
required_parameters.description: `pickUpEntityId` can be retrieved from `api/v1/cars/search-location` endpoint(data-> entity_id)

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description:
`currency` can be retrieved from `api/v1/get-config`(data->currency)
Default value: `USD`
Ex: `USD`

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description:
`locale` can be retrieved from `v1/get-config`(data->locale)
Default value: `en-US`
Ex: `en-US`

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description:
`market` can be retrieved from `api/v1/get-config`(data->market)
Default value: `US`
Ex: `US`

optional_parameters.name: dropOffEntityId
optional_parameters.description: `dropOffEntityId` can be retrieved from `api/v1/cars/search-location` endpoint(data-> entity_id)

optional_parameters.name: dropOffTime
optional_parameters.description:
Drop Off Time
Required: true
Format: `HH:MM`
Ex: `20:00`

optional_parameters.name: driverAge
optional_parameters.description: Driver's age (21 years and over)

optional_parameters.name: dropOffDate
optional_parameters.description:
Drop Off Date
Required: true
Format: `YYYY-MM-DD`
Ex: `2024-06-01`

api_list.name: search-location

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Names of locations, cities, districts, places, countries, counties etc.

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description:
`locale` can be retrieved from `v1/get-config`(data->locale)
Default value: `en-US`
Ex: `en-US`

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description:
`market` can be retrieved from `api/v1/get-config`(data->market)
Default value: `US`
Ex: `US`

api_list.name: search-incomplete
api_list.description:
Obtain complete data for the endpoint of `v1/flights/search-one-way`, `api/v1/flights/search-roundtrip` or `api/v1/flights/search-multi-city`

Until the item's `status` is `complete` (data->context->status=complete), you must call the API multiple times

required_parameters.name: sessionId
required_parameters.description:
Session id
Required: true
`sessionId` can be retrieved from` v1/flights/search-one-way` or `v1/flights/search-roundtrip` or `v1/flights/search-multi-city`(data->context->sessionId)

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description:
`currency` can be retrieved from `api/v1/get-config`(data->currency)
Default value: `USD`
Ex: `USD`

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description:
`locale` can be retrieved from `v1/get-config`(data->locale)
Default value: `en-US`
Ex: `en-US`

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description:
`market` can be retrieved from `api/v1/get-config`(data->market)
Default value: `US`
Ex: `US`

api_list.name: search-roundtrip
api_list.description:
This API helps to get the list of round trip flights.
**Note**:-  *In the event that the status is `incomplete` (data->context->status=incomplete), you must utilize the `api/v1/flights/search-incomplete` endpoint to retrieve the complete data until it's `complete` (data->context->status=complete).*

required_parameters.name: departDate
required_parameters.description:
Depart date
Required: true
Format: `YYYY-MM-DD`
Ex: `2024-06-01`

required_parameters.name: returnDate
required_parameters.description:
Return date
Required: true
Format: `YYYY-MM-DD`
Ex: `2024-06-05`

required_parameters.name: fromId
required_parameters.description:
From location Id
Required: true
`fromId` can be retrieved from `api/v1/flights/auto-complete`(data->id)
Ex: `eyJzIjoiTllDQSIsImUiOiIyNzUzNzU0MiIsImgiOiIyNzUzNzU0MiJ9` (New York)

required_parameters.name: toId
required_parameters.description:
To location Id
Required: true
`toId` can be retrieved from `api/v1/flights/auto-complete`(data->id)
Ex: `eyJzIjoiTE9ORCIsImUiOiIyNzU0NDAwOCIsImgiOiIyNzU0NDAwOCJ9` (London)

optional_parameters.name: adults
optional_parameters.description:
Adults: 12+ years
Default value: `1`
Ex: `2`

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description:
`currency` can be retrieved from `api/v1/get-config`(data->currency)
Default value: `USD`
Ex: `USD`

optional_parameters.name: cabinClass
optional_parameters.description:
Cabin class
Ex: `economy`
Default value: `economy`

`economy`: Economy
`premium_economy`: Premium Economy
`business`: Business
`first`: First

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description:
`locale` can be retrieved from `v1/get-config`(data->locale)
Default value: `en-US`
Ex: `en-US`

optional_parameters.name: children
optional_parameters.description:
Children: 2-12 years
Default value: `0`
Ex: `2`

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description:
`market` can be retrieved from `api/v1/get-config`(data->market)
Default value: `US`
Ex: `US`

optional_parameters.name: infants
optional_parameters.description:
Infants: Under 2 years
Default value: `0`
Ex: `1`

api_list.name: reviews
api_list.description: This API endpoint is responsible for providing a review list.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description:
Required: true
`id` can be retrieved from `v1/hotels/search`(data->results->hotelCards->id)
Ex: `218005414`

optional_parameters.name: dataSource
optional_parameters.description:
Providers
`dataSource` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/reviews`, data->filters[dataSource]-> type
Ex: `h_hc `
Default value: `all`
Some example values
`h_hc `: Reviews from Hotels.com
`h_vs `: Reviews from Tripadvisor
`h_xp `: Reviews from Expedia
`d_ct `: eviews from Trip.com

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
The page index is used to specify the page number.
Default value: `1`
Ex: `2`

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description:
Tags
`tags` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/reviews`, data->filters[tags]-> type
Ex: `room `
Default value: `all`
Some example values
`room`: Room
`location`: Location
`service`: Service
..............

optional_parameters.name: travellerRating
optional_parameters.description:
Traveller Rating
`travellerRating` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/reviews`, data->filters[travellerRating]-> type
Ex: `rating_excellent `
Default value: `all`
Some example values
`rating_excellent `: Excellent
`rating_good `: Good
`rating_average `: Average
..............

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
Sort by
`sort` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/reviews`, data->filters[sort]-> type
Ex: `rating_desc`
Default value: `recommended`
Some example values
`recommended`: Recommended
`rating_desc`: Rating (high to low)
`rating_asc`: Rating (low to high)

optional_parameters.name: guestType
optional_parameters.description:
Traveler type
`guestType` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/reviews`, data->filters[guestType]-> type
Ex: `group`
Default value: `all`
Some example values
`all`: All travelers
`business`: Business traveller
`couple`: Couple
..............

optional_parameters.name: filterLocale
optional_parameters.description:
Language
`filterLocale` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/reviews`, data->filters[filterLocale]-> type
Ex: `en-GB `
Default value: `all`
Some example values
`en-GB `: English (United Kingdom)
`de-DE `: Deutsch (Deutschland)
`fr-FR `: français (France)
`it-IT `: italiano (Italia)
..............

api_list.name: get-config
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://skyscanner80.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/get-config"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "skyscanner80.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://skyscanner80.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/get-config"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "skyscanner80.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: search
api_list.description: This API endpoint is responsible for the list of hotels.

required_parameters.name: checkin
required_parameters.description:
Check-in date
Required: true
Format: `YYYY-MM-DD`
Ex: `2024-06-01`

required_parameters.name: entityId
required_parameters.description:
Required: true
`entityId` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/auto-complete`(data->entityId)
Ex: `27537542`

required_parameters.name: checkout
required_parameters.description:
Check-out date
Required: true
Format: `YYYY-MM-DD`
Ex: `2024-06-02`

optional_parameters.name: cancellation
optional_parameters.description:
Cancellation policy
`cancellation` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/search` endpoint(data->results->filters(type=cancellation)->values->id)
It can input multiple values, and the values should be separated by commas
Ex: `free_cancellation,refundable`
Some example values
`free_cancellation`: Free cancellation
`refundable`: Refundable
`non_refundable`: Non-Refundable

optional_parameters.name: district
optional_parameters.description:
Neighborhoods
`district` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/search` endpoint(data->results->filters(type=district)->values->id)
It can input multiple values, and the values should be separated by commas
Ex: `27562849,27562665`
Some example values
`27562849`: Manhattan
`27562665`: Queens
`114666637`: Times Square
`114668259`: Hell'S Kitchen
…………..

optional_parameters.name: amenities
optional_parameters.description:
Amenities
`amenities` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/search` endpoint(data->results->filters(type=amenities)->values->id)
It can input multiple values, and the values should be separated by commas
Ex: `WifiService,Parking`
Some example values
`WifiService`: WiFi
`Parking`: Parking
`AirConditioning`: Air conditioning
`AirportShuttleService`: Airport Shuttle
…………..

optional_parameters.name: chain
optional_parameters.description:
Hotel chain
`chain` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/search` endpoint(data->results->filters(type=chain)->values->id)
It can input multiple values, and the values should be separated by commas
Ex:
`90718613, 203712798 `

optional_parameters.name: stars
optional_parameters.description:
Star rating
`stars` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/search` endpoint(data->results->filters(type=stars)->values->id)
It can input multiple values, and the values should be separated by commas
Ex: `no_stars,5`
Some example values
`5`: 5 stars
`4`: 4 stars
…………
`no_stars`: Unrated

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description:
`currency` can be retrieved from `api/v1/get-config`(data->currency)
Default value: `USD`
Ex: `USD`

optional_parameters.name: discountTypes
optional_parameters.description:
Deals
`discountTypes` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/search` endpoint(data->results->filters(type=discount_types)->values->id)
It can input multiple values, and the values should be separated by commas
Ex: `cug`

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description:
`market` can be retrieved from `api/v1/get-config`(data->market)
Default value: `US`
Ex: `US`

optional_parameters.name: adults
optional_parameters.description:
Adults
Default value: `1`
Ex: `4`

optional_parameters.name: mealPlan
optional_parameters.description:
Meal plan
`mealPlan` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/search` endpoint(data->results->filters(type=meal_plan)->values->id)
It can input multiple values, and the values should be separated by commas
Ex: `breakfast_included,RoomRates_label_mealsNotIncluded`
Some example values
`breakfast_included`: Breakfast included
`RoomRates_label_mealsNotIncluded`: Meals not included

optional_parameters.name: confidentType
optional_parameters.description:
Book with peace of mind
`confidentType` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/search` endpoint(data->results->filters(type=confident_type)->values->id)
It can input multiple values, and the values should be separated by commas
Ex:` free_cancellation,RoomRates_option_payOnArrival`
Some example values
`free_cancellation`: Free cancellation
`RoomRates_option_payOnArrival`: Pay on arrival

optional_parameters.name: guestType
optional_parameters.description:
Popular with
`guestType` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/search` endpoint(data->results->filters(type=guest_type)->values->id)
It can input multiple values, and the values should be separated by commas
Ex: `business,couple`
Some example values
`business`: Business travelers
`couple`: Couples
`family`: Families
`solo`: Solo travelers

optional_parameters.name: maxPrice
optional_parameters.description:
Max price
Maximum one decimal digit
Ex: `1000` or `1001.5`

optional_parameters.name: propertyType
optional_parameters.description:
Accommodation type
`propertyType` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/search` endpoint(data->results->filters(type=property_type)->values->id)
It can input multiple values, and the values should be separated by commas
Ex: `Hotel,ResidenceHotel,Hostel`
Some example values
`Hotel`: Hotel
`ResidenceHotel`: Residence
`Hostel`: Hostel
`GuestHouse`: Guest House
…………..

optional_parameters.name: minPrice
optional_parameters.description:
Min price
Maximum one decimal digit
Ex: `100` or `101.5`

optional_parameters.name: rating
optional_parameters.description:
Guest rating
`rating` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/search` endpoint(data->results->filters(type=rating)->values->id)
It can input multiple values, and the values should be separated by commas
Ex: `4.5,5`
Some example values
`3`: 3+ Satisfactory
`3.5`: 3.5+ Good
`4`: 4+ Very Good
`4.5`: 4.5+ Excellent
`5`: 5+ Outstanding

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description:
`locale` can be retrieved from `v1/get-config`(data->locale)
Default value: `en-US`
Ex: `en-US`

optional_parameters.name: priceType
optional_parameters.description:
Price type
Default value: `PRICE_PER_NIGHT`
Ex: `PRICE_PER_NIGHT`
Select one of the values provided below
`PRICE_PER_NIGHT`: Price per night
`PRICE_TOTAL`: Show total price for stay

optional_parameters.name: resultsPerPage
optional_parameters.description:
Total number of records per API call.
Default value: `15`
Ex: `10`

optional_parameters.name: childrenAges
optional_parameters.description:
Multiple values can be inputted, and they should be separated by commas.
Ex: `0,9,17`

`0`: < year old
`1`: 1 year old
`2`: 2 years old
…………..
`17`: 17 years old

optional_parameters.name: rooms
optional_parameters.description:
Rooms
Default value: `1`
Ex: `2`

optional_parameters.name: sorting
optional_parameters.description:
Sorting option.
Default value: `-relevance`
Ex: `-price`
Select one of the values listed below
`-relevance`: Best
`-price`: Price (high to low)
`price`: Price (low to high)
`distance`: Distance from downtown
`-rating`: Guest rating
`-stars`: Stars (5 to 1)
`stars`: Stars (1 to 5)

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
The page index is used to specify the page number.
Default value: `1`
Ex: `2`

`locale` can be retrieved from `v1/get-config`(data->locale)

Ex: `en-US`

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description:
`market` can be retrieved from `api/v1/get-config`(data->market)
Default value: `US`
Ex: `US`

optional_parameters.name: rooms
optional_parameters.description:
Rooms
Default value: `1`
Ex: `2`

optional_parameters.name: childrenAges
optional_parameters.description:
Multiple values can be inputted, and they should be separated by commas.
Ex: `0,9,17`

`0`: < year old
`1`: 1 year old
`2`: 2 years old
…………..
`17`: 17 years old

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description:
`currency` can be retrieved from `api/v1/get-config`(data->currency)
Default value: `USD`
Ex: `USD`

optional_parameters.name: adults
optional_parameters.description:
Adults
Default value: `1`
Ex: `4`

api_list.name: check-server-status
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://skyscanner80.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/checkServer"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "skyscanner80.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://skyscanner80.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/checkServer"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "skyscanner80.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
